The way I would handle this is to inject the relevant properties via a prop=
erties object, and then in production pass System.getProperties(), that way=
 the tests are not coupled to the nasty global which is the System property=
.

If that isn't an option for some reason, perhaps you can organize your d=
ifferent tests into suites, and set the system property in a @BeforeClass m=
ethod on the suite?

Yishai
